reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson is an amazing professor! She is extremely knowledgeable and passionate about the subject matter. Her lectures are engaging and she is always willing to help students during office hours. Highly recommend this course.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Professor Lee is a fair and reasonable instructor. His lectures can be dry at times, but he is very clear in explaining complex economic concepts. The workload is manageable, and he is accessible during office hours.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is an exceptional professor. Her lectures are well-organized and she uses a variety of teaching methods to ensure students understand the material. She is also very responsive to student questions and concerns.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Professor Gonzalez is a knowledgeable instructor, but his teaching style can be a bit dry at times. The coursework is fair, and he is willing to work with students who are struggling. Overall, a solid professor.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Patel is a passionate and engaging professor. Her lectures are thought-provoking and she encourages students to participate in class discussions. She is also very accessible and provides helpful feedback on assignments.
